summary: An email from Justin Houston of SigNet Technologies to an unspecified recipient regarding IP submittals needed to program the AMS server at MCC New York. The email includes attachments and is related to Federal Bureau of Prisons contracts.

persons.name: Justin Houston
persons.role: Program Manager for FBOP Contracts at SigNet Technologies
persons.context: Sender of the email requesting IP submittals be sent to computer services to proceed with programming the AMS server at MCC New York.

events.title: Email regarding IP submittals for MCC New York
events.description: Justin Houston sends an email requesting IP submittals be forwarded to computer services to enable programming of the AMS server at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.

locations: MCC New York (Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York)
keyFacts: The email is dated November 1, 2018, and concerns technical work related to the AMS server at MCC New York.
Justin Houston is identified as a Program Manager for FBOP (Federal Bureau of Prisons) Contracts at SigNet Technologies.
The communication is related to contracts with the Federal Bureau of Prisons, indicating SigNet Technologies' involvement with the correctional system.
